name: Bullet Panic
description:
A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2018.

You forgot to bring a gun to a bullet hell! This is a bullet hell game without shooting. Your only tool is to draw a path that deflects bullets.

Control:

Use mouse to control your movement

Hold Left Click to draw path, then let go to build a temporary shield

Credit: Explosion sound by dklon
Background music Vigilante from http://www.music-note.jp/bgm/sf.html
UI sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/
Loading music from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/
Enemey Sprite from Unity 2D Space Shooter Tutorial
